Class DocFocusInternalFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JInternalFrame
            • emr_vis_nlp.view.DocFocusInternalFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class DocFocusInternalFrame
extends javax.swing.JInternalFrame
    Popup window for displaying details about a given target document. code adapted (in small part) from MyInternalFrame Java demo.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
